metadata.description: Imagine stepping into the heart of a cherished past, a rich tapestry of memories unfolding with every note. This exclusive NFT, A Leap into Lexington Ave Boys, does exactly that. Within this seven-song audio mix, each melody represents a distinct day in an unforgettable week, set in the backdrop of Indianapolis, our shared stage of youth. Each song holds a universe of its own, much like every leap I've embarked upon. The thrill of Warcraft Wednesdays, the intrigue of the werewolf game nights, the camaraderie during those early morning runs - all encapsulated in the rhythm of the mix. Recollections of workouts at the YMCA, fun conversations with Jim, Mark and Web. Painful Ab classes with Toma reverberate in each tune. Woven into this sound of life are our peaceful walks to the Holy Rosary Church to hear the best lector that Toast Masters ever cultivated. The visual echo of this journey is a simple sketch, capturing a frozen moment in time - my brother and I sharing a smile on the doorstep of 702 1/2 Lexington Ave. This NFT is more than an audio-visual keepsake. It's a leap into a bygone era, a bond of brotherhood, and a symphony of a life lived fully. Step in, and let the rhythm of our past play once again.
metadata.name: Lexington Ave Boys
